Description.Text:
Property Location
Victor Apartments offers accommodations throughout the area in McCracken.  

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 9 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Digital television is provided for your entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as a fireplace in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance. Additional amenities at this Beaux Arts apartment include a picnic area and barbecue grills.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as a fireplace in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance. Additional amenities at this Beaux Arts apartment include a picnic area and barbecue grills.
Make yourself at home in one of the 9 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Digital television is provided for your entertainment.

Victor Apartments offers accommodations throughout the area in McCracken.  

Accommodations are located at multiple addresses. Regional attractions include:

Hindmarsh River Estuary Boardwalk
McCracken Golf Course
Victor Harbor Convention Centre
Greenhills Adventure Park
Soldier Memorial Gardens
Warland Reserve
Granite Island
Victor Harbor Golf Club
Goolwa Golf Course
Artworx Gallery
Ballast Stone Estate Winery
Currency Creek Estate Wines

The preferred airport for Victor Apartments is Adelaide, SA (ADL).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
